description: This is a React functional component for a registration page in a bike taxi booking system. It provides a user interface for creating a new account, handling form state, submission, and interaction with authentication API functions.

methods.name: RegisterPage
methods.description: React component managing user registration form, handling input state, form submission, and navigation upon success.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, calls API for user registration and login, and redirects based on user role.
